About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm an aspiring front-end developer from Vilnius. Why development and why front-end? It's nice to realize that you can create something useful and beautiful from nothing, just from idea.

I have a strong passion to learn new things and develop my current skills.

Technical skills

  • HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Sass
  • Javascript, jQuery
  • Git, command line

January 2019 - June 2019

Participate in WomenGoTech seson 3 where I had the opportunity to take a part in events and practice sessions related with web development, UX/UI design, e-commerce.

During the program period updated my Portfolio.

February 2019

FreeCodeCamp

Take and finish Responsive Web Design lessons and get certification by completing its 5 final projects.

Final projects you can see in codepen (click to view).

March 2015 - May 2015 (3 months)
